text: Nde kha nuianan ki tɨvi mbatɨgi, nde ndavir ntan nɨɨŋv, nde vhɨra kha nuianan ki bigi, nde za ndavir ntan nɨɨŋ thari. Guma kha nuianan ki tɨvi mbatɨgi, ana ndavar nta ndɨɨi, ana nza won Ndia Fhe Bakɨme, ana guigira won ndavar kha nuianan ki gumgi ga nɨɨŋgiap, guigira mbe vuzvugi tɨv anan ki fhu.
